mapper.update: update tbl_sys_menu_info set menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, req_url = #{reqUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_main = #{isMain,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authority_level = #{authorityLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, req_url, is_main, icon, authority_level from tbl_sys_menu_info
